Concurrent Medications Log

Source: R/data.R
RECCMEDS.Rd

Concurrent Medications Log data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(RECCMEDS)

Format

A data frame with 72194 observations and 31 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • COLPROT character Study protocol of data collection , with options: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Participant roster ID Range value: 2, ..., 10527

  • VISCODE character Visit code

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • VISDATE Date Registry EXAMDATE on matching VISCODE Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • RECNO numeric Range value: 1, ..., 104

  • CMMED character Concurrent Medication

  • CMMEDID numeric medlist ID Range value: 1, ..., 1544

  • CMUNITSID character

  • CMUNITS numeric Units

    • ADNI2: 1=drop (gtt); 2=gram (gm); 3=international units (IU); 4=microgram (mcg); 5=milligram (mg); 6=milliliter (ml); 7=percent (%); 8=puff; 9=spray (spray); 10=tablespoon (15mL) (tbsp); 11=tablets (tabs); 12=teaspoon (5mL) (tsp); 13=other (OT)

    • ADNI3: 1=drop (gtt);2=gram (gm);3=international units (IU);4=microgram (mcg);5=milligram (mg);6=milliliter (ml);7=percent (%);8=puff;9=spray (spray);10=tablespoon (15mL) (tbsp);11=tablets (tabs);12=teaspoon (5mL) (tsp);13=other (OT)

    • ADNI4: 1=drop (gtt); 10=tablespoon (15mL) (tbsp); 11=tablets (tabs); 12=teaspoon (5mL) (tsp); 13=other (OT); 2=gram (gm); 3=international units (IU); 4=microgram (mcg); 5=milligram (mg); 6=milliliter (ml); 7=percent (%); 8=puff; 9=spray (spray)

  • CMFREQID character

  • CMFREQNC numeric Frequency

    • ADNI1

    • ADNI2: 1=2 times a day (bid); 2=3 times a day (tid); 3=as needed (prn); 4=continuous (cont); 5=every 12 hours (q12h); 6=every 4 hours (q4h); 7=every morning (qam); 8=every night at bedtime (qhs); 9=every other day (qod); 10= once a day (daily) (qd); 11=once (1x); 12=once a month (1xm); 13=other (OT)

    • ADNI3: 1=2 times a day (bid);2=3 times a day (tid);3=as needed (prn);4=continuous (cont);5=every 12 hours (q12h);6=every 4 hours (q4h);7=every morning (qam);8=every night at bedtime (qhs);9=every other day (qod);10=once a day (daily) (qd);11=once (1x);12=once a month (1xm);13=other (OT)

    • ADNI4: 1=2 times a day (bid); 10=once a day (daily) (qd); 11=once (1x); 12=once a month (1xm); 13=other (OT); 2=3 times a day (tid); 3=as needed (prn); 4=continuous (cont); 5=every 12 hours (q12h); 6=every 4 hours (q4h); 7=every morning (qam); 8=every night at bedtime (qhs); 9=every other day (qod)

  • CMROUTEID character

  • CMROUTE numeric Route

    • ADNI1

    • ADNI2: 1=both ears (au); 2=each eye (oe); 3=intramuscular (im); 4=intravenous (iv); 5=nasal (nas, ns); 6=oral (po); 7=subcutaneous (sc, sq); 8=sublingual (sl, subling); 11=topical (top, tp); 9=transdermal (td, tdrm); 10=other (OT)

    • ADNI3: 1=both ears (au);2=each eye (oe);3=intramuscular (im);4=intravenous (iv);5=nasal (nas, ns);6=oral (po);7=subcutaneous (sc, sq);8=sublingual (sl, subling);9=transdermal (td, tdrm);10=other (OT);11=topical (top, tp)

    • ADNI4: 1=both ears (au); 10=other (OT); 11=topical (top, tp); 2=each eye (oe); 3=intramuscular (im); 4=intravenous (iv); 5=nasal (nas, ns); 6=oral (po); 7=subcutaneous (sc, sq); 8=sublingual (sl, subling); 9=transdermal (td, tdrm)

  • CMREASON numeric Reason Prescribed

    • ADNI1

    • ADNIGO: 1=Adverse Event;2=Therapeutic Use;3=Prophylaxis/Non-therapeutic Use

    • ADNI2: 1=Adverse Event;2=Therapeutic Use;3=Prophylaxis/Non-therapeutic Use

    • ADNI3: 1=Adverse Event;2=Therapeutic Use;3=Prophylaxis/Non-therapeutic Use

    • ADNI4: 1=Adverse Event; 2=Therapeutic Use; 3=Prophylaxis/Non-therapeutic Use

  • CMEVNUM character If Adverse Event, enter event number:

  • CMBGN character Date Began

  • CMBGNYR_DRVD numeric Year Began (Derived from CMBGN) Range value: 1930, ..., 2924

  • CMCONT numeric Is the medication continuing?

    • ADNI1: 1=Yes;0=No

    • ADNIGO: 1=Yes;0=No

    • ADNI2: 1=Yes;0=No

    • ADNI3: 0=No;1=Yes

    • ADNI4: 0=No; 1=Yes

  • CMEND character Date Ended

  • CMENDYR_DRVD numeric Year Ended (Derived from CMEND) Range value: 1985, ..., 2918

  • ID numeric Record ID Range value: 6, ..., 182286

  • SITEID numeric Site ID Range value: 1, ..., 941

  • USERDATE Date User Create Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 Date User Last Modify Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • DD_CRF_VERSION_LABEL character CRF Version Label , with options: v1

  • LANGUAGE_CODE character Language Code e=English

  • HAS_QC_ERROR numeric Has Quality Check Error 0=Does not have QC error or QC error has been approved; 1=Has QC error

  • update_stamp POSIXct POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
